description.@value: Makes 4 Servings 6 SmartPoints per whole English Muffin

ingredients.@value: ¾ cup barbecue sauce (I use sugar-free to suit my diabetic needs)
4 Bay's English Muffins, split and untoasted
⅓ cup shredded smoked gouda cheese
1 cup shredded cooked chicken breast (I use rotisserie chicken when in a hurry)

recipeInstructions.@value: Place the Bay's English Muffin halves on a baking sheet
Top evenly with chicken mixture, and then sprinkle the tops with onion and cheese
Mix chicken breast and barbecue sauce in a medium bowl and set aside
Bake atÂ 400Â°F for 12-14 minutes or until the cheese is melted and lightly browned.
Mix cheeses together in a small bowl and set aside
